3248.verse: مَن|Whoever|78|86|76$جَآءَ|comes|62|78|4023$بِٱلْحَسَنَةِ|with the good,|117|133|6213$فَلَهُۥ|then for him|100|116|1045$خَيْرٌ|(will be) better|119|135|520$مِّنْهَا|than it,|69|85|246$وَهُم|and they,|84|92|256$مِّن|from|50|102|53$فَزَعٍ|(the) terror|96|199|13305$يَوْمَئِذٍ|(of) that Day|108|211|3485$ءَامِنُونَ|(will be) safe.|111|163|13306$

3251.verse: وَأَنْ|And that|78|94|1470$أَتْلُوَاْ|I recite|68|100|13310$ٱلْقُرْءَانَ‌ۖ|the Quran."|96|128|4239$فَمَنِ|And whoever|106|138|1494$ٱهْتَدَىٰ|accepts guidance|137|169|8349$فَإِنَّمَا|then only|82|98|1086$يَهْتَدِى|he accepts guidance|158|165|8350$لِنَفْسِهِۦ‌ۖ|for himself;|94|108|8351$وَمَن|and whoever|105|119|1012$ضَلَّ|goes astray|98|112|1017$فَقُلْ|then say,|83|97|2705$إِنَّمَآ|"Only|55|69|102$أَنَا۟|I am|49|56|2308$مِنَ|of|50|308|156$ٱلْمُنذِرِينَ|the warners."|109|367|13055$

3252.verse: وَقُلِ|And say,|78|108|7888$ٱلْحَمْدُ|"All praise (be)|117|176|5$لِلَّهِ|to Allah,|75|134|6$سَيُرِيكُمْ|He will show you|130|190|13311$ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ|His Signs,|87|117|706$فَتَعْرِفُونَهَا‌ۚ|and you will recognize them.|209|218|13312$وَمَا رَبُّكَ|And your Lord is not|154|172|8795$بِغَـٰفِلٍ|unaware|76|94|723$عَمَّا|of what|71|89|724$تَعْمَلُونَ|you do."|92|101|725$

3254.verse: تِلْكَ|These|60|111|1038$ءَايَـٰتُ|(are the) Verses|129|230|2243$ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ|(of) the Book|108|209|811$ٱلْمُبِينِ|the clear.|84|135|8796$

3256.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|81|58$فِرْعَوْنَ|Firaun|93|116|2649$عَلَا|exalted himself|118|141|13316$فِى|in|48|71|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the land|92|115|100$وَجَعَلَ|and made|84|107|5086$أَهْلَهَا|its people|84|95|6621$شِيَعًا|(into) sects,|103|117|5689$يَسْتَضْعِفُ|oppressing|118|145|13317$طَآئِفَةً|a group|74|101|3400$مِّنْهُمْ|among them,|106|133|730$يُذَبِّحُ|slaughtering|100|127|13318$أَبْنَآءَهُمْ|their sons|88|102|1320$وَيَسْتَحْىِۦ|and letting live|118|132|13319$نِسَآءَهُمْ‌ۚ|their women.|106|135|6724$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, he|91|120|396$كَانَ|was|57|86|913$مِنَ|of|50|79|156$ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ|the corrupters.|120|134|5118$

3257.verse: وَنُرِيدُ|And We wanted|125|134|13320$أَن|to|44|63|655$نَّمُنَّ|bestow a favor|120|139|13321$عَلَى|upon|63|82|52$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|108|20$ٱسْتُضْعِفُواْ|were oppressed|124|143|6553$فِى|in|48|57|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the land|92|113|100$وَنَجْعَلَهُمْ|and make them|121|164|13322$أَئِمَّةً|leaders|67|110|11856$وَنَجْعَلَهُمُ|and make them|121|164|13323$ٱلْوَٲرِثِينَ|the inheritors,|113|134|11900$

3248.verse: Whoever comes [at Judgement] with a good deed will have better than it, and they, from the terror of that Day, will be safe.

3249.verse: And whoever comes with an evil deed - their faces will be overturned into the Fire, [and it will be said], "Are you recompensed except for what you used to do?"

3250.verse: [Say, O Muhammad], "I have only been commanded to worship the Lord of this city, who made it sacred and to whom [belongs] all things. And I am commanded to be of the Muslims [those who submit to Allah]

3251.verse: And to recite the Qur'an." And whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] himself; and whoever strays - say, "I am only [one] of the warners."

3252.verse: And say, "[All] praise is [due] to Allah. He will show you His signs, and you will recognize them. And your Lord is not unaware of what you do."

3254.verse: These are the verses of the clear Book.

3255.verse: We recite to you from the news of Moses and Pharaoh in truth for a people who believe.

3256.verse: Indeed, Pharaoh exalted himself in the land and made its people into factions, oppressing a sector among them, slaughtering their [newborn] sons and keeping their females alive. Indeed, he was of the corrupters.

3257.verse: And We wanted to confer favor upon those who were oppressed in the land and make them leaders and make them inheritors
